session_summary: Added frequency selector (1-17 posts/day) to autonomous page with real-time save. Implemented MCP bridge loading from .mcp.json with selective server loading (tavily, perplexity, context7, token-efficient - excluding netlify, playwriter). Fixed restart and health scripts for dynamic path resolution. Replaced 'Current Phase' with 'Active Persona' display on autonomous page. Approved plan for job scheduler implementation to replace Vercel cron with local node-cron scheduler. Next: Implement job scheduler (ScheduledJob model, cron package, scheduler service, instrumentation hook).
